title: #490 BERNIE SANDERS HOSTS ‘LOUDER WITH CROWDER’! | Mark Levin Guests
description: It's a special edition of Louder with Crowder, as Bernie Sanders takes over for Steven. Talking Ben Carson and Oreos, milkshake attacks, cow kissing, and Bernie runs through how much the other Democrats suck. The Great Mark Levin guests, and Half-Asian Bill Richmond sits third chair.
itunes:author: Blaze Podcast Network
